citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
***There is excessive accumulation of excreta on the perches in the Roller Pigeon Coup, the fantail pigeon enclosure and
on top of the helmeted pigeon box. Allowing excess accumulations increases disease hazards, problems with pest control
and odors.
Excreta must be removed from primary enclosures and from under and around primary enclosures as often as necessary
to prevent excessive accumulation of feces and food waste, to prevent soiling of the birds contained in the primary
enclosures, and to reduce disease hazards, insects, pests, and odors.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.158(a)(1)  Repeat
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
***There is excessive accumulation of excreta on the perches in the Roller Pigeon Coup, the fantail pigeon enclosure and 
on top of the helmeted pigeon box. Allowing excess accumulations increases disease hazards, problems with pest control 
and odors. 
 
 Excreta must be removed from primary enclosures and from under and around primary enclosures as often as necessary 
to prevent excessive accumulation of feces and food waste, to prevent soiling of the birds contained in the primary 
enclosures, and to reduce disease hazards, insects, pests, and odors. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
